content:
@all
Hi Everyone!

I am working with a small but very established software company, we are looking for an "application development lead/architect" type of person - 20% hands-on coding and 80% managing development for a healthcare/EMR related product, smaller team of up to 10 devs, smaller company but does very well in the space. .NET/FHIR ecosystem. Do you know anyone? Salary somewhat open for the right person! Location: Greater Toronto Area.

Please ping me directly: igor@lannick.com
For recruiting, send a message to @Grahame Grieve who'll put it in the right stream
